name: Shiqi Liu
content: I am a first-year Ph.D. student at [Safe AI Lab](https://safeai-lab.github.io/) at Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) advised by Prof. [Ding Zhao](https://www.meche.engineering.cmu.edu/directory/bios/zhao-ding.html) Previously, I earned a master's degree in Mechanical Engineering from CMU. My current research interests include Reinforcement Learning and Geometric Learning in the context of Robotics.
